text: The Gateway PunditWhat a Speech!...The Donald says it's time to "Make America Great Again"His big presidential announcement was today at 11 AM ET."I will build a great wall. And nobody does walls better than me. Very inexpensively. I will build a great, great wall on our southern border and I will have Mexico pay for that wall."
title: Press Release - Donald Trump: I Would Build a Great, Great Wall on Our Southern Border and Make Mexico Pay For It
